name: Rails Devise GraphQL
description: This is a boilerplate to build your next Saas product. It's a RubyOnRails 5 API only backend with Authentication and GrpahQL API.

CLIENT_URL.description: Enter your client domain for CORS.

DEVISE_JWT_SECRET_KEY.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed JWT tokens.

WEB_CONCURRENCY.description: The number of processes to run.
